pages.text: $(li)The Outback Leggings is a quiet better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/phantom_armor)Phantom Leggings$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has Armour Toughness giving you extra protection from strong attacks.

pages.name: Outback Leggings
pages.text: It offers a little probability of avoid projectile attacks like Arrows too.
